sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BBS (BBS_SN, CATEGORY, SUBJECT, CONTENTS, WRITNG_ID, WRITNG_DT, VIEWCNT, DELETE_AT, SECRET_AT) SELECT NVL(MAX(BBS_SN), 0) + 1, #category#, #subject#, #contents#, #esntl_id#, SYSDATE, 0, 'N', #secret_at# FROM TB_BBS
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_BBS SET VIEWCNT = VIEWCNT + 1 WHERE BBS_SN = #bbs_sn#
UPDATE TB_BBS SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' WHERE BBS_SN = #bbs_sn#
UPDATE TB_BBS SET SUBJECT = #subject#, CONTENTS = #contents#, UPDT_ID = #esntl_id#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE, SECRET_AT = #secret_at# WHERE BBS_SN = #bbs_sn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT B.BBS_SN, B.CATEGORY, B.SUBJECT, B.CONTENTS, B.WRITNG_ID, B.VIEWCNT , U.USER_NM AS USER_NM, SECRET_AT, U.EMAIL AS EMAIL, TO_CHAR(B.WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITNG_DT FROM TB_BBS B INNER JOIN TB_USER U ON B.WRITNG_ID = U.ESNTL_ID WHERE B.BBS_SN = #bbs_sn#

SELECT B.BBS_SN, B.SUBJECT, B.VIEWCNT, TO_CHAR(B.WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS WRITNG_DT, U.USER_NM AS USER_NM, SECRET_AT, B.WRITNG_ID FROM ( SELECT BBS_SN, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT BBS_SN FROM TB_BBS WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY BBS_SN DESC ) A ) AA INNER JOIN TB_BBS B ON AA.BBS_SN = B.BBS_SN INNER JOIN TB_USER U ON B.WRITNG_ID = U.ESNTL_ID ORDER BY AA.RNUM
